title: Exemptions of voters on election day
context: ยง11-94 Exemptions of voters on election day. Every voter shall be privileged from arrest on election day while at the voter&rsquo;s polling place and in going to and returning therefrom, except in case of breach of the peace then committed, or in case of treason or felony. [L 1970, c 26, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
